taskGroup.name: IDE Basics
taskGroup.intro: Let's get you familiarized with the basics of the Eclipse IDE.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Now that you've gotten these basics down. Why not try unit 1? You can access it via the cheatsheet listing under help.

task.name: Perspectives
task.intro: First we need to make sure the IDE is configured for running jACT-R models.
task.onCompletion: The jACT-R perspective is preconfigured for modeling. However, you are free to reconfigure it as you need for your workflow.

task.name: Views
task.intro: Views provide access to your data, models, and files.
task.onCompletion: Tip: Views can often be configured and customized themselves. Look for the triangle in the upper right-hand corner of the view.

task.name: Projects
task.intro: Everything in this IDE is centered around projects. Continue to learn more...
